description.narrative: Project 4 will finance the water supply and sanitation (WSS) services in Zugdidi and Poti, and water supply services in Gudauri and Jvari. The first component of the project will support infrastructure investments to rehabilitate, improve, and expand WSS facilities in Zugdidi and Poti, respectively; and benefit approximately 20,600 households in Zugdidi and 13,250 households in Poti by the end of the project period. The second component will include project implementation support and management.
